channel.title: Dog Days on Adam Israel
channel.description: Recent content in Dog Days on Adam Israel

item.title: Free fiction in support of making Crossed Genres a pro-paying magazine
item.description: I’ve been a fan of Crossed Genres for a long time — just shy of three years, which is forever in Internet time. As a small press, they’ve done a massive amount of good work publishing hundreds of authors (including myself) but Bart and Kay, proprietors, fell on hard times and were forced to turn to Kickstarter to keep CG alive. And made their goal of $4,000 in just 22 hours.
